question: IPL: Chennai Super Kings vs. Rajasthan Royals 2023-04-12
description:
In the upcoming IPL game, scheduled for April 12 at 10:00 AM ET:

If the Chennai Super Kings win, the market will resolve to “Chennai”.

If the Rajasthan Royals win, the market will resolve to “Rajasthan”.

 If the game is not completed by April 19, 2023 (11:59:59 PM ET), the market will resolve 50-50.

question: ETH above $1,900 on April 13?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if the Binance 1 minute candle for ETH/USDT titled 2023/04/13 12:00 in the ET timezone (referring to noon ET) has a final “Close” price of 1,900.01 or higher, or to "No" otherwise.

The resolution source for this market is https://www.binance.com, specifically the ETH/USDT “Close” prices, currently available at https://www.binance.com/en/trade/ETH_USDT. The Binance API url for ETH/USDT may be used in the event that the chart is unavailable.

Please note that this market is about the price according to Binance ETH/USDT, not according to other sources or spot markets.

events.title: ETH above $1,900 on April 13?
events.description: This is a market group for the price market for ETH

question: Will Nakamigos or Valhalla have a higher floor price on July 12?
description:
This market will resolve to the NFT collection with the higher floor price on July 12, 2023, 12:00:00 PM ET.

This market will resolve to "Nakamigos" if Nakamigos has a higher floor price than Valhalla on the resolution time. This market will resolve to "Valhalla" if Valhalla has a higher floor price than Nakamigos on the resolution time. If the floor prices of the NFT collections under consideration are exactly equal on the resolution time, this market will resolve 50-50.

The floor price on July 12 will be calculated using https://pro.opensea.io/, or if it ceases to exist, https://blur.io. At 12:00 PM ET, all listings that have existed for at least 1 hour will be considered, and the lowest price of them will be used as the floor price for the respective collections. Only listings that don't have a "suspicious activity" marker on https://pro.opensea.io will be considered. Listings across the marketplaces Blur, OpenSea, LooksRare, and x2y2 will count, in addition to other marketplaces that https://pro.opensea.io lists.

question: Will CryptoPunks or BAYC have a higher floor price on April 30?
description:
This market will resolve to the NFT collection with the higher floor price on April 30, 2023, 12:00:00 PM ET.

This market will resolve to "CryptoPunks" if CryptoPunks has a higher floor price than Bored Apes Yacht Club (BAYC) on the resolution time. This market will resolve to "BAYC" if BAYC has a higher floor price than CryptoPunks on the resolution time. If the floor prices of the NFT collections under consideration are exactly equal on the resolution time, this market will resolve 50-50.

The floor price on April 30 will be calculated using https://pro.opensea.io/, or if it ceases to exist, https://blur.io. At 12:00 PM ET, all listings that have existed for at least 1 hour will be considered, and the lowest price of them will be used as the floor price for the respective collections. The Larva Labs website (https://cryptopunks.app/cryptopunks/forsale) may be used for listing times of CryptoPunks.

Only listings that don't have a "suspicious activity" marker on https://pro.opensea.io will be considered. Incremental NFTs will not count be considered. Listings across the marketplaces Blur, OpenSea, LooksRare, and x2y2 will count, in addition to other marketplaces that https://pro.opensea.io lists. 

The Polymarket description may be referenced as memorialization.

question: Will U.S. inflation be greater than 0.1% from March to April 2023?
description:
This is a market on a month-to-month inflation, as measured by the Bureau of Labor Statistics (CPI-U), from March to April 2023. Inflation is measured by a change in Consumer Price Index for All Urban Consumers (CPI-U) on a seasonally adjusted basis, reported by the U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics.

This market will resolve to “Yes” if the index increased by more than 0.1 percent (on a seasonally adjusted basis) from March to April 2023 and “No“ otherwise.

The resolution source for this market will be the BLS April 2023 Consumer Price Index report (https://www.bls.gov/bls/news-release/cpi.htm), currently scheduled to be released on May 10, 2023, at 8:30 AM ET. Resolution of this market will take place upon release of the aforementioned data.

----

The Consumer Price Index (CPI) is a measure of the average change over time in the prices paid by urban consumers for a market basket of consumer goods and services.

Note: the resolution source for this market will be the official monthly BLS CPI news release which reports seasonally-adjusted month-to-month inflation to only one decimal point (e.g. 0.7%). Thus, this is the level of precision that will be used when resolving the market (e.g. if seasonally adjusted month-to-month CPI-U is 0.2%, the market will resolve to “Yes”, if it is 0.1%, this market will resolve to “No”).

events.title: What will U.S. inflation be from March to April 2023?
events.description: This is a market group over US inflation from March to April 2023.

question: Will FTX relaunch by June 30?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if users can make an account and buy ETH and/or BTC on a relaunched FTX by June 30, 2023, 11:59:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

This market will resolve according to official information released by FTX, the leadership of FTX, and/or official representatives of FTX (e.g. lawyers, spokespeople, etc.), however a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

events.title: Will FTX relaunch by June 30?
events.description:

If the Milwaukee Brewers win, the market will resolve to “Brewers”.

 If the game is not completed by April 28, 2023 (11:59:59 PM ET), the market will resolve 50-50.
